title: This article identifies a two-enzyme system from a large gut microbiome library that enables generation of universal O-type blood from A-type donors
raw_citation: This article identifies a two-enzyme system from a large gut microbiome library that enables generation of universal O-type blood from A-type donors P Rahfeld Nat. Microbiol 4 2019 An enzymatic pathway in the human gut microbiome that converts A to universal O type blood
